predicate.note: Frames file for 'dethrone' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Change of leadership.

example.name: Pittsburgh? king?
example.text: Pittsburgh figures it will be dethroned [*-1] but plans to accept its ouster graciously.

example.name: all args
example.text: A peasants revolt dethroned John as king of Lower Slobovia.
